description: PagerDuty's official MCP server which provides tools to interact with your PagerDuty account.

PAGERDUTY_USER_API_KEY.description: PagerDuty User API Token - obtain from User Settings > API Access in your PagerDuty account

PAGERDUTY_API_HOST.description: PagerDuty API host URL (default: https://api.pagerduty.com, EU: https://api.eu.pagerduty.com)
